messages.subject: Non-War living history/ 19th Century (was History ideas)
messages.msgSnippet: Check out: www.keepinghearthandhome.com The opening page is a bit tedious - but the links are great as is the newsletter/journal. Disclaimer - I did a bit of
messages.messageBody:
Check out:
www.keepinghearthandhome.com

The opening page is a bit tedious - but the links are great as is
the newsletter/journal.

Disclaimer - I did a bit of consulting for her, so I may be
biased.



----- Original Message -----
From: "gruvystarchild" <starsuncloud@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 1:05 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] History ideas


| "My 9 yr. olds favorite, at the time, is Civil War."
| BJ
|
|
| Hey BJ,
| We had some interest going on the civil war a little over a
year ago.
| We were lucky enough to have some homeschoolers do a "geography
day"
| on it, due to the fact that they were re-enactors of civil war
| times.
